description:
<p>Pilgrims Hospices is seeking to recruit an additional Health Care Assistant to support our Hospice in Ashford</p>
<p>The post holder is responsible for providing individual high quality care for patients in the hospice setting including appropriate support for families in line with hospice policy. Care may include supporting patients whilst symptoms are assessed and brought under control, caring for the dying, supportive psychosocial and spiritual care in line with any agreed plan and enabling patient’s independence and progressing discharge home.</p>
title: Healthcare Assistant
